message.content:
Here’s a list of 50 "message of the day" quotes related to Elon Musk, formatted as an array of JSON objects:

```json
[
    {"message": "When something is important enough, you do it even if the odds are not in your favor.", "author": "Elon Musk"},
    {"message": "I think it’s possible for ordinary people to choose to be extraordinary.", "author": "Elon Musk"},
    {"message": "Persistence is really the only skill that matters.", "author": "Elon Musk"},
    {"message": "There are really four things that I want to accomplish: Make humanity a multi-planetary species, make a revolutionary electric vehicle, accelerate the transition to sustainable energy, and invent a brain interface.", "author": "Elon Musk"},
    {"message": "Some people don't like change, but you need to embrace change if the alternative is disaster.", "author": "Elon Musk"},
    {"message": "You get paid in direct proportion to the difficulty of problems you solve.", "author": "Elon Musk"},
    {"message": "I could either watch it happen or be a part of it.", "author": "Elon Musk"},
    {"message": "Failure is an option here. If things are not failing, you are not innovating enough.", "author": "Elon Musk"},
    {"message": "If something’s important enough, you should try. Even if the probable outcome is failure.", "author": "Elon Musk"},
    {"message": "Patience is a virtue, and I’m learning patience. It’s a tough lesson.", "author": "Elon Musk"},
    {"message": "You shouldn't do things differently just because they're different. They need to be... better.", "author": "Elon Musk"},
    {"message": "I think the best way to find yourself is to lose yourself in the service of others.", "author": "Elon Musk"},
    {"message": "What makes you a rocket scientist? The answer is simple: You like to learn.", "author": "Elon Musk"},
    {"message": "In the end, life is about luck. But, you can increase your luck by working hard.", "author": "Elon Musk"},
    {"message": "Brand is just a perception, and perception will match reality over time.", "author": "Elon Musk"},
    {"message": "Sometimes you have to take a leap of faith.", "author": "Elon Musk"},
    {"message": "I think it’s important to have a future that is inspiring and uplifting.", "author": "Elon Musk"},
    {"message": "A lot of people in the world will try to tell you what you can and cannot do.", "author": "Elon Musk"},
    {"message": "I would like to die on Mars. Just not on impact.", "author": "Elon Musk"},
    {"message": "If we can have a future that is inspiring and uplifting, then we won’t be sure what we’re going to achieve, but we’re definitely going to achieve something.", "author": "Elon Musk"},
    {"message": "Your will is the most accurate way to predict the future.", "author": "Elon Musk"},
    {"message": "Any product that needs a manual to work is broken.", "author": "Elon Musk"},
    {"message": "To be able to think of a solution to a problem and be effective, you have to own that problem.", "author": "Elon Musk"},
    {"message": "There’s a way to do it better – find it.", "author": "Elon Musk"},
    {"message": "The first step is to establish that something is possible; then probability will occur.", "author": "Elon Musk"},
    {"message": "If you don’t push the boundaries, then you are going to remain stagnant.", "author": "Elon Musk"},
    {"message": "We need to be adventurous, we need to be bold, and we need to be innovative.", "author": "Elon Musk"},
    {"message": "I think we will be able to have a City on Mars in 50 to 100 years.", "author": "Elon Musk"},
    {"message": "Some people don’t want to change; they want to stay in their comfort zone.", "author": "Elon Musk"},
    {"message": "The universe is a very big place, and there’s a lot of potential there.", "author": "Elon Musk"},
    {"message": "Be a maker, a creator – not just a taker.", "author": "Elon Musk"},
    {"message": "Everything that is broken can be fixed or improved.", "author": "Elon Musk"},
    {"message": "Run toward the problem and embrace it.", "author": "Elon Musk"},
    {"message": "Innovation is the key to saving the human race.", "author": "Elon Musk"},
    {"message": "Your work is going to fill a large part of your life; the only way to be truly satisfied is to do what you believe is great work.", "author": "Elon Musk"},
    {"message": "Life is too short for long-term grudges.", "author": "Elon Musk"},
    {"message": "You can’t just sit back and expect it to work.", "author": "Elon Musk"},
    {"message": "Space travel is the only way to ensure our future.", "author": "Elon Musk"},
    {"message": "Disrupt yourself before someone else does.", "author": "Elon Musk"},
    {"message": "You’ve got to take risks. If you don’t take risks, you can’t create anything.", "author": "Elon Musk"},
    {"message": "We achieve what we believe.", "author": "Elon Musk"},
    {"message": "Look at how far humanity has come and think of how much more is possible.", "author": "Elon Musk"},
    {"message": "If you want to be the CEO of a company, you should be open to idea challenges.", "author": "Elon Musk"},
    {"message": "It’s not about how you start; it’s about how you finish.", "author": "Elon Musk"},
    {"message": "The future is about redefining the impossible.", "author": "Elon Musk"},
    {"message": "The way I think about it is you should take whatever obstacles come your way, and figure out how to get around them.", "author": "Elon Musk"},
    {"message": "Great ideas are often misunderstood.", "author": "Elon Musk"},
    {"message": "Be a voice, not an echo.", "author": "Elon Musk"},
    {"message": "Every person is on their own journey, but we can all improve together.", "author": "Elon Musk"}
]
```

Feel free to use and modify this JSON array as needed!
